data.title: Oneida County Clerk
data.meta_description: The Oneida County Clerk files Oneida County tax records and Oneida County land records and is the commissioner of deeds, among other county responsibilities.
data.text:
**The Rome DMV will be closed Thursday, July 17, 2024 due to tornado damage.

The Utica DMV will be open normal business hours on Thursday, July 17, 2024.**

Overview

Monday - Friday Hours 8:30 am to 4:30 pm

We accept in person filings/recordings up to 4:15 pm daily

The Office of the Oneida County Clerk is charged with four main functions:

Office of the Registrar – Filing official documents including Oneida County land records and court records.

Department of Naturalization – Offers many services, including notary, commissioner of deeds, passport, naturalization services, and our most popular program, our passport photo service.

Department of Motor Vehicles with offices in Utica and Rome.

Regional Records Center – Cares for Oneida County's historical documents. This office houses several services geared toward historical research.

Contact the County Clerk

Please fill out and submit the form below and we will get back to you promptly.
